attributes.action: Provide a national monument to the victims of coronavirus in the uk
attributes.additional_details:
It is a tragedy that so many have died from covid 19 we are at war against a virus
like any war those who have died should be remembered
attributes.background: Provide a national site and memorial stone engraved with the names those who died due to cover 19 in the uk

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Commission a Memorial Plaque to honour and remember UK victims of the Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310097

Commission & fund a National Pandemic Memorial, Institute & annual commemoration: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314589
